title: Image Classification
description:
📌 Perceptrons classify images into categories.
✅ Used in facial recognition, object detection, and medical imaging.
🔍 Example: Identifying handwritten digits (MNIST dataset).
👉 Can you think of an industry that benefits from image classification?

title: Spam Detection
description:
📌 Perceptrons classify emails as spam or not spam.
✅ Uses features like keywords, sender, and formatting.
🔍 Example: Filtering phishing emails in Gmail.
👉 Have you noticed spam emails being classified incorrectly?

title: Speech Recognition
description:
📌 Converts spoken language into text.
✅ Perceptrons recognize patterns in audio waveforms.
🔍 Example: Virtual assistants like Siri and Google Assistant.
👉 What’s your most-used voice command?

title: Handwriting Recognition
description:
📌 Perceptrons convert handwritten text into digital text.
✅ Used in OCR (Optical Character Recognition) systems.
🔍 Example: Digitizing bank cheques.
👉 Have you used an OCR tool before?

title: Credit Risk Assessment
description:
📌 Banks use perceptrons to assess loan applicants.
✅ Factors: Credit score, income, past defaults.
🔍 Example: Approving or rejecting a loan application.
👉 Would you trust AI to decide your loan eligibility?

title: Medical Diagnosis
description:
📌 Detects diseases from medical data (X-rays, ECG, lab tests).
✅ Used in cancer detection and heart disease prediction.
🔍 Example: AI diagnosing pneumonia from chest X-rays.
👉 Should AI be used in critical medical decisions?

title: Stock Market Prediction
description:
📌 Analyzes historical trends to predict stock prices.
✅ Uses features like past prices, trading volume, and market sentiment.
🔍 Example: Algorithmic trading systems.
👉 Do you think AI can consistently beat the stock market?

title: Sentiment Analysis
description:
📌 Detects emotions in text (positive, negative, neutral).
✅ Used in social media monitoring and customer reviews.
🔍 Example: Analyzing tweets about a product launch.
👉 Have you ever read a review that seemed AI-generated?

title: Autonomous Vehicles
description:
📌 Perceptrons help self-driving cars detect obstacles and road signs.
✅ Process images from cameras and LiDAR sensors.
🔍 Example: Tesla’s Autopilot feature.
👉 Would you feel safe in a fully autonomous car?

title: Fraud Detection
description:
📌 Identifies fraudulent transactions using historical data.
✅ Used in banking and cybersecurity.
🔍 Example: Flagging suspicious credit card transactions.
👉 Have you ever received a fraud alert from your bank?

title: Game AI
description:
📌 Helps NPCs (non-player characters) make intelligent decisions.
✅ Used in strategy games, racing games, and shooter games.
🔍 Example: AI opponents in chess or FPS games.
👉 Which game has the smartest AI you’ve played against?

title: Customer Support Chatbots
description:
📌 Perceptrons power chatbots that answer queries.
✅ Used in e-commerce, banking, and healthcare.
🔍 Example: AI chatbots on websites providing customer assistance.
👉 Do you prefer AI chat support or human support?
